item.title: .Jar Making error[PLEASE HELP]
item.dc:creator: @beastt21 beastt21
item.description:
@beastt21 wrote:

Okay, I dont know if this is the right section but i feel like it is.

I have my server everything is running okay, its just that when i try to make a .jar file in CMD prompt it gives me errors. There was no EGUI file on download so i just transfered one from a diff client folder. I dont know what to enter here is the code for the EGUI file:

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“”, “”, “”
});
}
}

My manifest file was main-class: EGUI,
But i had to make an egui as i said.
So after the CMD process didnt work, I used JARMAKER. It creates the .jar file but when i open it it says “Could not find Main Class: Client. Program will exit”

PLEASEE SOMEONE ANSWER THESE TO QUESTIONS…
1. What should I put inbetween my “” in my EGUI file
2.How do I fix the error when i open it.

**Note: My client project didnt come with an egui file
***Note:IF you help me with either one of theses it will work.

Thanks!

Read full topic
